name: STAR MAZE
description:
Puzzle lovers rejoice!  STAR MAZE is a refreshingly different kind of logic puzzle game that includes stars AND mazes.  You'll be starry-eyed and amazed by the challenging puzzles that await your brain's enjoyment.  Please note: this version of STAR MAZE includes three puzzles, but have no fear - I plan to release a fancier version with music, sound effects, graphical enhancements and, most importantly, more puzzles.  But I digress.  Play the game.  Solve the puzzles.  Feel good about life.

***  "Desert" tileset courtesy of Thorbjørn Lindeijer's Tiled Map Editor
